articles.author: Sounak Mukhopadhyay
articles.title: Inzamam-ul-Haq accuses Rohit Sharma's India of ball tampering in T20 World Cup 2024; fans say, ‘Shame on you’ | Mint - Mint
articles.description: ‘If it was a Pakistani bowler, there could have been controversy,’ Inzamam-ul-Haq said while accusing India of ball tampering in the Australia match at the T20 World Cup 2024.
articles.content: Indias unbeaten run at the T20 World Cup 2024 continues as the Men in Blue are all set to face England in the second semifinal. Meanwhile, Inzamam-ul-Haq has accused India of ball tampering.The forme… [+2575 chars]

articles.title: Mitchell Marsh 'in tears' after Gulbadin Naib's controversial act in Afghanistan knocking Australia out of T20 World Cup - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Amid the criticism, Australia captain Mitchell Marsh gave his first reaction on Gulbadin Naib's controversial act | Crickit
articles.content: After a brutal dig from Australia cricketer Adam Zampa, who labelled Gulbadin Naib's controversial act in the T20 World Cup Super Eight match between Afghanistan and Bangladesh on Tuesday as "the old… [+2462 chars]
